Abstrak: The article reviews the exhibition "Inventing Abstraction" with works by Marcel Duchamp at the Museum of Modern Art in New York City as of March 2013, “Fragments 1968-2012,” with works by Giorgio Griffa at the Casey Kaplan Gallery in New York City, and an exhibition of paintings by Thomas Nozkowski at the Pace Gallery in New York City through March 23, 2013.
Sumber: Nation. 3/25/2013, Vol. 296 Issue 12, p31-34. 4p. 2 Color Photographs
